message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at the special price of $200.  It's a great deal!
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. While I can't go as low as $120, I'm willing to come down to $170. This is a very competitive price for what you're getting.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $170 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
